Record.Term: Sargramostim Plasmid DNA Hepatocellular Carcinoma Vaccine Adjuvant
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Antineoplastic Vaccine/Sargramostim Plasmid DNA Hepatocellular Carcinoma Vaccine Adjuvant

Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Synonym: GM-CSF Plasmid DNA Hepatocellular Carcinoma Vaccine
Sargramostim Plasmid DNA Hepatocellular Carcinoma Vaccine Adjuvant
Record.Description: A vaccine adjuvant consisting of a plasmid DNA encoding sargramostim (granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor). Upon administration, expressed sargramostim may stimulate a cytotoxic T cell response enhancing the host immune response to a concomitantly administered hepatocellular carcinoma vaccine. (NCI05)
